title: Daniel the Draw-er
description: An alternate cover edition can be found here."This is no ordinary pencil,” says the cat sitting on the end of nine-year-old Daniel’s bed. "It's magic." Everything Daniel draws with his pencil--flying dragons, Octobears, and pizza-loving aliens from the planet Beezo--comes to life. It’s pretty awesome until the pencil draws a line between Daniel and his best (and only) friend Annie. Come along with Daniel and his fantastic creatures on this fun-for-the-whole-family journey as he discovers that friendship is the greatest magic of all.
author: S.J. Henderson
